Skills:
Very strong experience with Telecom Operators, dealing with mid and upper level management, matured from in-depth engagement as a supplier, SI, or other advanced Operators
Exceptionally strong communication and presentation skills
University degree a must,
Solid technical skills to be combined with a business acumen, and ability to create trustable business cases, making assumptions where data are not available
Ability to work on short time schedules
Ability to network also inside Saudi Telecom and with Vendors, and acquire information typically what other leading Operators are doing on advanced topics (LCC worldwide engagements will surely help here)
Successful candidate will be directly reporting to the General Manager of Network Infrastructure Design and lead the consulting activities
The candidate will also liaise closely with leading individuals and experts in and take the leadership role in engaging LCC in providing differentiating value add to client.
By very nature of the day-day activities, the candidate will be in close touch with leading suppliers, perform in-depth technical discussions, drive the engagements and catalyze the supplier’s value add toward client
Experience preferably acquired with advanced Western operators
Qualification:
BE in Electrical/Telecommunications/Electronics or equivalent from a recognized engineering university
10 – 15+ years of experience in Telecom Network Engineering Design and Planning
Specific advanced technical skills & experience in Network Design:
Key Skills: 5G RAN, O-RAN, Mobile Core, in particular 4G/5G, NSA, Network Slicing, QoS, 5G Use Cases – working with partners, driving new value, End-end future network vision, and high level architecture view, Capex savings measures, Business Cases
At least 2 to 4 years experience on LTE Core side and at least 6+ experience on 3G-2G networks, LTE (design, planning).
Experience with Cisco & Aruba Wi-Fi solution is highly desirable.
Preferably a member of the Association for Project Management, qualified to be one or more of following PMP /PMI/CAPM/ IAPM / CSM/ MPM/ CPMP or Prince
